Grammar:    DataElement 6.0
Namespace:  shr.test

Entry: TypeConstraintOnValue
Parent:     SimpleBase
Description:  "It is a simple element based on SimpleBase and specializing the value"
Value:        Simple is type Simple2

Entry: TypeConstraintOnValueChild
Parent:     ComplexBase
Description:  "It is a simple element based on SimpleBase and specializing the value's child"
Value:        Complex
Property:     Complex.Simple 1..1
              Complex.Simple substitute Simple2

Entry: TypeConstraintOnField
Description:  "It is a group entry with a type constraint on a field"
Parent:     GroupBase
            Simple substitute Simple2

Entry: TypeConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:  "It is a group entry with a type constraint on a field's child"
Property: Simple 0..1
Property: Complex 0..1
Property: Complex.Simple 1..2
          Complex.Simple substitute Simple2

Entry: TypeConstraintOnFieldValue
Parent:     Group2
Description:  "It is a group entry with a type constraint on a field's value"
              HasSimpleValue value substitute Simple2

Element:      SimpleBase
Value:        Simple

Element:      Simple
Value:        string

Element:      Simple2
Parent:       Simple
Value:        string

Element:      ComplexBase
Value:        Complex

Element:      Complex
Property:     Simple 0..1
Property:     CodedFromValueSet 1..*

Element:      CodedFromValueSet
Value:        code from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded (required)

Element:      GroupBase
Property:     Simple 0..1
Property:     CodedFromValueSet 0..1
              CodedFromValueSet from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded2 (required)

Element:      HasSimpleValue
Value:        Simple

Element:      Group2
Property:     HasSimpleValue 0..1
Property:     CodedFromValueSet 0..1
              CodedFromValueSet from http://standardhealthrecord.org/test/vs/Coded2 (required)
